price: Kugeza ubwo yageze hagati y’imisozi ibiri miremire, inyuma yayo ahasanga abantu batumvaga neza (ibyo babwirwa bitewe no kudasobanukirwa neza ururimi).
arabic: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ بَيۡنَ ٱلسَّدَّيۡنِ وَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمَا قَوۡمٗا لَّا يَكَادُونَ يَفۡقَهُونَ قَوۡلٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ḥattā idhā balagha bayna al-sadayni wajada min dūnihimā qawman lā yakādūna yafqahūna qawlan
